mapper.insert: INSERT INTO aci_sns(id, sns_uid, wx_id, app_id, app_ctg, pet_nam, type, token, tkn_duetim, usr_id, crer_id) VALUES(#{id}, #{uid}, #{wxid}, #{app.id}, #{app.category}, #{petName}, #{type}, #{token}, #{overdueTime}, #{user.id}, #{user.id})
mapper.select: SELECT sns.id, sns.sns_uid, sns.wx_id, sns.app_id, sns.app_ctg, sns.pet_nam, sns.type, sns.token, sns.tkn_duetim, sns.cre_tim, usr.id AS usr_id, usr.username AS usr_username, usr.pet_nam AS usr_pet_nam, usr.alias AS usr_alias, usr.slogan AS usr_slogan, usr.email AS usr_email, usr.mugshot AS usr_mugshot, usr.phoneNumber AS usr_phoneNumber FROM aci_sns AS sns LEFT JOIN aci_user AS usr ON usr.id = sns.usr_id WHERE sns.sns_uid = #{id} AND sns.type = #{type}

SELECT sns.id, sns.sns_uid, sns.wx_id, sns.app_id, sns.app_ctg, sns.pet_nam, sns.type, sns.cre_tim, usr.id AS usr_id, usr.username AS usr_username, usr.pet_nam AS usr_pet_nam, usr.alias AS usr_alias, usr.slogan AS usr_slogan, usr.email AS usr_email, usr.mugshot AS usr_mugshot, usr.phoneNumber AS usr_phoneNumber FROM aci_sns AS sns LEFT JOIN aci_user AS usr ON usr.id = sns.usr_id WHERE sns.wx_id = #{id} AND sns.type = #{type}
